# weibulltools 0.6.0

Implementation of Log-Location-Scale Models with threshold parameter ("weibull3", "lognormal3", "loglogistic3"). 
Implementation of Location-Scale Models ("sev", "normal", "logistic"). 

Implementation of Likelihood Profiling and R-Squared Profiling. 
Implementaion of Log-Likelihood Function for all distributions.
